channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Polarion ALM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Polarion ALM

item.title: CVE-2023-28828|2024-08-02T13:51:38.510Z -- siemens -- polarion%20alm
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Polarion ALM (All versions < V22R2). The application contains a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) vulnerability. This could allow an attacker to view files on the application server filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2024-33647|2024-08-02T02:36:04.542Z -- siemens -- polarion%20alm
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Polarion ALM (All versions < V2404.0). The Apache Lucene based query engine in the affected application lacks proper access controls. This could allow an authenticated user to query items beyond the user's allowed projects.

item.title: CVE-2024-33647|2024-06-04T17:43:52.579Z -- siemens -- polarion%20alm
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Polarion ALM (All versions < V2404.0). The Apache Lucene based query engine in the affected application lacks proper access controls. This could allow an authenticated user to query items beyond the user's allowed projects.

item.title: CVE-2024-23813|2024-05-15T07:23:55.656Z -- siemens -- polarion%20alm
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Polarion ALM (All versions < V2404.0). The REST API endpoints of doorsconnector of the affected product lacks proper authentication. An unauthenticated attacker could access the endpoints, and potentially execute code.

item.title: CVE-2023-50236|2024-05-15T07:23:50.387Z -- siemens -- polarion%20alm
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Polarion ALM (All versions < V2404.0). The affected product is vulnerable due to weak file and folder permissions in the installation path. An attacker with local access could exploit this vulnerability to escalate privileges to NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM.
